lead_paragraph: Actress and comedian Rosie O'Donnell is returning to ABC's long-running morning talk show "The View" to co-host it with Whoopi Goldberg, the television network said on Thursday.

headline.main: Rosie O'Donnell to Return to TV Talk Show 'The View'
headline.print_headline: Rosie O'Donnell to Return to TV Talk Show 'The View'

snippet: Actress and comedian Rosie O'Donnell is returning to ABC's long-running morning talk show "The View" to co-host it with Whoopi Goldberg, the television network said on Thursday....
